sourcesContent:
• BillID: {{ bill.billId }}, ConsumerID: {{ bill.consumerId.consumerId }}, Month: {{ bill.month }}, Year: {{ bill.year }}, Units Consumed: {{ bill.unitsConsumed }}, Total Bill Amount: {{ bill.totalAmount }}
No Bills Found! import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; import { Bill } from '../bill'; import { BillServiceService } from '../bill-service.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-result', templateUrl: './result.component.html', styleUrls: ['./result.component.css'], }) export class ResultComponent { userName!: string; password!: string; Bills!: Bill[]; checkBillsStatus() { return this.Bills.length != 0; } constructor( private _Activedroute: ActivatedRoute, private billService: BillServiceService ) { console.log('here2'); } ngOnInit() { console.log('here3'); this.userName = this._Activedroute.snapshot.queryParams['userName']; this.password = this._Activedroute.snapshot.queryParams['password']; console.log(this.userName); console.log(this.password); this.billService .getAllBillsAdmin(this.userName, this.password) .subscribe((bills) => (this.Bills = bills)); } }
